titleStmt.title: Here beginneth the second part of the fryer and the boy Many a merry jest herein is exprest.
Fryer and the boy. Part 2.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by A.M. and R.R. for Edward Brewster a[t] the Crane in St. Paul's Church-yard, and are to be sold by James Gilbertson next door to the Sun and Bible on London-bridge,

notesStmt.note: Caption title on A3r reads: The second part of the Frier and the boy.
